description: Creates a listener for a service. Before you start using your Amazon VPC Lattice service, you must add one or more listeners. A listener is a process that checks for connection requests to your services.

TargetGroups.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Forward.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

StatusCode.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

FixedResponse.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

DefaultAction.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

TargetGroupIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^((tg-[0-9a-z]{17})|(arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:targetgroup/tg-[0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: No interruption

Weight.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

WeightedTargetGroup.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^(?!listener-)(?![-])(?!.*[-]$)(?!.*[-]{2})[a-z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

Port.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: Replacement

Protocol.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: HTTP | HTTPS  
Update requires: Replacement

ServiceIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 21  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^((svc-[0-9a-z]{17})|(arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:service/svc-[0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 21  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^((svc-[0-9a-z]{17})|(arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:service/svc-[0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn(:[a-z0-9]+([.-][a-z0-9]+)*){2}(:([a-z0-9]+([.-][a-z0-9]+)*)?){2}:service/svc-[0-9a-z]{17}/listener/listener-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 26  
Maximum Length: 26  
Pattern: ^listener-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 21  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:service/svc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServiceId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 21  
Maximum Length: 21  
Pattern: ^svc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption
